title: FIle not in the manifest
body:
My game keeps bug splatting in the loading screen because it says a file is not in the manifest. I've tried reinstalling and doing everything it said on the how to fix page on support.riotgames.com. Anyone know how to fix this?

Here's what the rd3 log says:
ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.148/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.

ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.148/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml

ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "\Bin\Data\C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.148/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.

ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :\Bin\Data\C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.148/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml

replies.body: This is happening to me to, ever since the new windows update. Ive reinstalled, repaired my client, and went through the entire bugsplat guide y'all have. Nothing is working

Hey man I finally got my league to work. Go to this link and it will show you how to completely reinstall the game. After that I reinstalled and it's working fine. http://www.askvg.com/how-to-completely-uninstall-remove-a-software-program-in-windows-without-using-3rd-party-software/

There may be issues going on with the disk your League is installed on or any number of other system issues. If you haven't already, I recommend giving our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) a go, as it covers the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if those steps resolved this or caused any change.
I gave the bugsplat guide a go but to no avail. I sent a report in with all the files and am waiting. Anything else you could think of?
